title: Facts you MUST know about breast cancer
text: Facts you MUST know about breast cancer India is among the top three countries bearing the global breast cancer burden. TNN | Updated: Feb 3, 2017, 07.03 PM IST India is among the top three countries bearing the global breast cancer burden. In India, it is the most common cancer and also the leading cancer killer among women. Scarily, there is an increasing incidence of breast cancer among women in their 30s and 40s. Women diagnosed with breast cancer at an early stage are better able to survive the disease compared to those who were diagnosed in an advanced stage.
